text: Tomara bala, ‘amara imana enechi allah‌ra prati ebam ya amadera nayila hayeche, ebam ya ibarahima, isama’ila, isahaka, iya’kuba o tara bansadharadera prati [1] prati nayila hayeche, ebam ya musa, isa o an'yan'ya nabiganake tadera rabera nikata hate deya hayeche [2]. Amara tadera madhye kono taratamya kari na [3]. Ara amara tamra'i kache atmasamarpanakari’
